advisories.impact: Secure text fields may be displayed via the Accessibility Keyboard when using a physical keyboard
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Don Clarke

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access sensitive user data
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

cves.credit: Kirin (@Pwnrin)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access information about a user's contacts
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

cves.credit: Noah Roskin-Frazee and Prof. J. (ZeroClicks.ai Lab)

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted file may lead to unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: Multiple issues in curl
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed by updating to curl version 8.4.0.

advisories.impact: A process may gain admin privileges without proper authentication
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Yann GASCUEL of Alter Solutions

advisories.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management.
